channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Americans more worried about inflation and unemployment after new trade deals leave tariffs at highest level in decades
item.description: Fresh worries about inflation soured Americans on the economy in early August, underscoring lingering anxiety about the highest U.S. tariffs in decade...

item.title: Goldman researchers warn of an unfriendly asymmetry: Why the next big market move may be down.
item.description: After 18 record highs, Goldman researchers say it’s time to prepare for a fall in the stock market.

item.title: Car buyers rev up U.S. retail sales in effort to beat tariff price hikes. Economy is still growing.

item.title: Standard Chartered’s stock is slumping as a Republican lawmaker calls for a probe
item.description: Standard Chartered shares slumped on Friday after a lawmaker close to the Trump administration requested that the Justice Department probe the bank ov...

item.title: Why Applied Materials’ latest earnings have investors so spooked
item.description: Analysts wonder if China’s recent “overspending” on chip equipment is coming to a halt — and if the company is losing market share to rivals.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
